meanings.sent1: I need to renotify my friend about the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please renotify the team about the change in schedule.
meanings.sent3: It's important to renotify everyone so they don't forget.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock will renotify you if you oversleep.
meanings.sent5: Don't worry, I will renotify you if there are any updates.

meanings.sent1: After the technical issue is fixed, we can renotify the users.
meanings.sent2: The system will automatically renotify the recipients if the message fails to send.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally renotified the same person twice.
meanings.sent4: The app will renotify you when your package is out for delivery.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to renotify them if they haven't responded yet.
